projects.title: Jira
projects.description: Cloning in Jira refers to creating an exact copy of an existing issue. The clone inherits all the fields, including summaries, descriptions, attachments, and linked issues, but it gets a new issue key. This helps streamline workflow management by enabling quick duplication of tasks. You can test the as guest with email:'test@gmail.com', password:'test'. If yot want test full function follow Readme.md.

projects.title: Air-bnb-api
projects.description: Air-bnb-api is a project that simulates the Airbnb application, providing an online platform for short-term home rentals. This project recreates the main features of Airbnb, allowing users to register, log in, search, and book accommodations. With a user-friendly interface and flexible accommodation management system, Air-bnb-api delivers a convenient and easy online home rental experience.

projects.title: Youtube-clone
projects.description: The YouTube Clone is a video-sharing platform that allows users to upload, watch, and interact with video content. This application replicates the core functionalities of YouTube, providing a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Random quotes machine
projects.description: The Random Quotes Machine is a dynamic and interactive web application designed to inspire and entertain users with a diverse array of quotes. Each time the user interacts with the machine, it generates a new, random quote from a rich database containing quotes from various authors, philosophers, celebrities, and historical figures.
